comments.comment:
Dear. Mr. Nagananda.
I was watching your YouTube meetings and many other speeches last few weeks ,because I felt what you are saying has a good meaning , Particularly your constitutional bill which you expect to forward to public on upcoming election .im in a good understanding position now and I want to know little bit more . 
I understand how your plan can work after an election , but my query is , if you win election , few minutes after winning that provincial councils will be revoke , so under those councils there are many people working, what is your immediate plan to support people who work in those areas .?
Next one is , why don‚Äôt you get your team right now to face public , I mean , you can get them to conduct pocket meetings as you do , because taking your message cross the country is not possible in few months , it could take time therefore as a forehand preparation you must get your people to walk though the villages and educate people . Then you can eradicate doubts still remains among some people about your political objectives. 
I be honest with you , if I felt that you can‚Äôt win in the election I would not vote you because it can be a waste . My second option is Gotha , but if you express what is your second plan after not succeeding in election that I would consider to change my position. 
Just imagine you only obtained 15 Lakhs of votes in the election , what will you do , because 15 Lakhs have voted you . Kindly could you tell me
